##### FILE: hostName_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/hostname:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: hostname
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hostname
  serviceName: hostname
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hostname
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.gitlab.com/seongjindo/commonapi:latest
        name: hostname
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

kind: Pod

  name: hostnamespaces2

  containers:

    name: container1
  hostPID: true

    name: initcontainer1

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostnamespaces2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostnamespaces2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  hostPID: true

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostnamespaces2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostnamespaces2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  hostPID: true
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostnamespaces2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostnamespaces2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  hostPID: true
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostnamespaces2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostnamespaces2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  hostPID: true
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - --
        image: ubuntu
        name: hostnetwork-exec-deployment
      hostNetwork: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: hostpath-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: hostpath-volume

---

##### FILE: hostpath17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/fluentd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    demo: fluentd-logging
    version: v1
  name: fluentd
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      demo: fluentd-logging
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        demo: fluentd-logging
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: K8S_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_HOST
          value: elasticsearch-logging
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_PORT
          value: "9200"
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_SCHEME
          value: http
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_SSL_VERIFY
          value: "true"
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_SSL_VERSION
          value: TLSv1_2
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_USER
          value: elastic
        - name: FLUENT_ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD
          value: changeme
        - name: LOGZIO_TOKEN
          value: ThisIsASuperLongToken
        - name: LOGZIO_LOGTYPE
          value: kubernetes
        image: quay.io/fluentd_elasticsearch/fluentd:v3.2.0
        name: fluentd
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log
        name: varlog

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpath-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpath-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - echo "Writing data to /data/hostpath-volume..."; echo "Hello from Kubesimplify"
      > /data/hostpath-volume/hello.txt; sleep 3600
    image: busybox
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data/hostpath-volume
      name: host-storage
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /tmp/hostpath
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: host-storage

---

          name: vollogs

          path: /var/log/nginx
          type: Directory
        name: vollogs

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:

      app: my-app
  template:

        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: hostpath-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: hostpath-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/webserver:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    run: webserver
  name: webserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx-webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: web-data
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - git
    - clone
    - https://github.com/shamimice03/demo-init-container.git
    - /temp-repo
    image: alpine/git
    name: git
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /temp-repo
      name: web-data
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /root/web
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: web-data

---

##### FILE: hostpath22.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          value: root
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mongo
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-hostpath
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data
        name: mongo-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpath-dp.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hostpath-dp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: hostpath-dp
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx
        resources: {}
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/app
          name: hostpath-pv
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: hostpath-pv
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: hostpath-pvc

---

##### FILE: hostpath-exec-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hostpath-exec-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pentest
    type: deployment
  name: hostpath-exec-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pentest
      type: deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: pentest
        type: deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - while true; do sleep 30; done;
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - --
        image: ubuntu
        name: hostpath-exec-deployment
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host
          name: noderoot
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: noderoot

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/core:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: core
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/core:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: core

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    name: hostpath-pod
  name: hostpath-pod

    - containerPort: 80

    - mountPath: /test-nginx

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvol:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: hostpathvol
  name: hostpathvol
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - while sleep 10; do echo $(date) >> /usr/data/index.html; done;
    image: nginx
    name: hostpathvol
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/data
      name: hostvol
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  restartPolicy: Always
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /data/foo
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: hostvol
status: {}

---

    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes0103.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/containers/0/securityContext/

1 - validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule validate-registries failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/image/

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

        - ALL

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:

    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:

    name: volume-hostpath

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0

  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

  initContainers:

  securityContext:

    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:

    name: volume-hostpath

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

  - hostPath:

    name: volume-hostpath

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes045.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes046.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes047.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes048.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes050.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes051.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes052.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

##### FILE: hostpathvolumes0660.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpathvolumes0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: hostpathvolumes0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: volume-emptydir
  - hostPath:
      path: /a
    name: volume-hostpath

---

##### FILE: hostpat-vol-mount.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostpath-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    name: hostpath-pod
  name: hostpath-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      apk update && apk add --no-cache curl && echo Kubernetes DevOps on HostVolume - $(date) >> /output/output.txt && sleep 3600
    image: alpine
    name: hostpath-pod
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /output
      name: hostpath-vol
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /var/tmp
    name: hostpath-vol

---
